tooltip.cybernetics.section.head: Head
tooltip.cybernetics.mk1_berserk.descript:
A chip implanted into the user's brain, heightening their senses temporarily. When activated, the user enters a state of _rage_, giving the following effects: 
- _Resistance 4_
- _Regeneration_
- _+30% speed_
- _+70% attack speed_
Duration: _10 seconds_.
Cooldown: _1 minute._
tooltip.cybernetics.mk2_berserk.descript:
A chip implanted into the user's brain, moderately heightening their senses temporarily. When activated, the user enters a state of _rage_, giving the following effects: 
- _Resistance 4_
- _Regeneration_
- _+30% speed_
- _+70% attack speed_
- _+3 damage_ with fists.
Duration: _12 seconds_.
Cooldown: _50 seconds._
tooltip.cybernetics.mk3_berserk.descript:
A chip implanted into the user's brain, significantly heightening their senses temporarily. When activated, the user enters a state of _rage_, giving the following effects: 
- _Resistance 4_
- _Regeneration 2_
- _+50% speed_
- _+70% attack speed_
- _+5.5 damage_ with fists.
Duration: _15 seconds_.
Cooldown: _45 seconds._
tooltip.cybernetics.carbon_fiber_skull.d: Woven plating made with high strength carbon fiber, giving the user permanent _+3 armor_.
tooltip.cybernetics.mk1_dash.description:
A basic automatic injection system giving the user a boost in adrenaline, allowing them to _dash forward_ when pressing the _dash key_.
Cooldown: _5 seconds_.
tooltip.cybernetics.mk2_dash.description:
An upgraded injection system over the Mk 1, allowing the user to additionally _dash in midair_.
Cooldown: _5 seconds_.
tooltip.cybernetics.mk1_optics.descripti: A basic cybernetic eye system. Displays information about the user's _stored energy_ and _rejection_, as well as _nearby mob health_.
tooltip.cybernetics.mk2_optics.descripti: An upgraded cybernetic eye system. Along with the effects of the Mk1, it allows the user to _scan nearby mobs_, highlighting them.
tooltip.cybernetics.mk3_optics.descripti: A advanced cybernetic eye system.  Along with the effects of the Mk2, it allows the user to
tooltip.cybernetics.night_vision_eyes.de: An augment to any optics, allowing for _perfect vision_ even in _total darkness_.
tooltip.cybernetics.emergency_defibrilla:
An emergency AED unit that will restart the heart in cases of sudden trauma. _Revives_ the user _once_ when they die, giving them temporary _regeneration_ and some health back.
Cooldown: _2 minutes_
tooltip.cybernetics.oxygen_recycler.desc: A mechanical pump connected directly to the lungs, allowing the body to save oxygen produced elsewhere to maintain the user's breath. Gives a _75%_ chance to _not consume air bubbles_. Stacks with Respiration.
An aritifical sac that improves blood flow through the body, giving the user permanent _+5 maximum health_.
tooltip.cybernetics.stomach_filter.descr: This item is yet to be implemented, and currently unobtainable. Sorry!
tooltip.cybernetics.synaptic_disabler.de: This item is yet to be implemented, and currently unobtainable. Sorry!
tooltip.cybernetics.mk1_double_jump_adde: An internal booster that sits next to the stomach, providing more energy to the user's _Reinforced Tendons_. Gives _+1 extra midair jump_.
tooltip.cybernetics.mk2_double_jump_adde: An advanced booster that spreads across the user's pelvis, providing even more of a boost to the user's _Reinforced Tendons_. Gives _+2 extra midair jumps_.
A replacement for much of the user's skeleton, significantly increasing its _durability_ and _sturdiness_. Gives the user permanent _+2 armor_.
tooltip.cybernetics.titanium_skeleton.de: A significantly stronger replacement for the user's skeleton, made of pure _titanium_. Gives the user permanent _+5 armor_ and _+2 armor toughness_.
tooltip.cybernetics.health_boost_skeleto: A specialized skeleton replacement that allows the body to produce stem cells more rapidly, giving the user permanent _+5 max health_.
tooltip.cybernetics.kinetic_discharger.d:
A web of thin titanium sheets that absorb kinetic energy and allow the user to release it at once. When falling, the user can _sneak_ to release it, _spiking down_ towards the ground. The produced shockwave _damages nearby enemies._
Cooldown: _5 seconds_.
tooltip.cybernetics.fire_resistance_skin: A thin layer of heat-proof plating embedded into the skin. Renders the user _immune to fire_ and other _extreme heat_.
tooltip.cybernetics.range_extender.descr: A set of specialized pistons allowing the user to extend their arms further than before, providing them permanent _+1 block reach_.
tooltip.cybernetics.strength_hands.descr: Steel knuckles embedded within the user's hands that enhance their attacks. Gives permanent _+5 damage_ when _unarmed_ or using _fist type weapons_, and _+3 damage_ othewise.
tooltip.cybernetics.stone_mining_fists.d: A total hand replacement, fortifying every part of the user's fists. Allows the user to _mine stone_ and other blocks with their _bare hands_ incredibly quickly.
tooltip.cybernetics.speed_legs.descripti: A set of artificial muscle fibers that wrap around the user's ligaments, giving a permanent _swiftness_ effect.
tooltip.cybernetics.reinforced_tendons.d: A metal support structure that fortifies and greatly enhances the user's tendons. Allows the user to _double jump_.
tooltip.cybernetics.bionic_feet.descript: A simple foot replacement that doesn't do much on its own, but is required for many other augments. In addition, it gives permanent _+2 armor_.
tooltip.cybernetics.sound_absorbent_feet: A set of rubber-padded soles that are embedded under the user's skin, making the user's _footsteps silent_. The acronym doesn't stand for anything.
tooltip.cybernetics.jump_boost_feet.desc: A full sole replacement, with specialized springs allowing for higher jumps. Gives the user permanent _Jump Boost._
tooltip.cybernetics.full_speed_feet.desc: A specialized embedded system modeled after the paws of felines, enhancing the user's ability to traverse difficult terrain. Prevents _slowdown_ from _blocks_ the user is walking on, such as Soul Sand or Honey.
